      • playersTurn

        public static void playersTurn(int first_roll,
                               int second_roll,
                               int third_roll,
                               int[] points)
        Outputs the ASCII art and new scores for a player. The rolled die are displayed horizontally, with the round score, extra points, round total and the new running total to the right.
        Parameters:
        first_roll - first rolled die of the payer in this round
        second_roll - second rolled die of the payer in this round
        third_roll - third rolled die of the payer in this round
        points - player's score in this round, extra points, and running total

      • tieBreaker

        public static void tieBreaker(int player_1_dice,
                              int player_2_dice)
        Outputs the results of the tie-breaker. Two die are displayed horizontally, one per player. Their new running totals are displayed beneath them.
        Parameters:
        player_1_dice - rolled score of player 1
        player_2_dice - rolled score of player 2
